author: kfogel
msg: Fix the rcsparse situation as much as can, update documentation:
* rcsparse/: New directory, taken from latest ViewCVS.
* rcsparse.py: Removed.
* tools/cvs2svn/README: Apply Michael Wood's patch about the RCS 'co'
dependency, and describe the rcsparse situation.

author: philip
msg: stress.pl doesn't have enough options... so add -W to create
repositories using -bdb-txn-nosync and -P to create larger files.
* tools/dev/stress.pl
(init_repo): Add -bdb-txn-nosync stuff
(populate): Add file padding stuff.
(ParseCommandLine): Add -P and -W.
("Main"): Pass -P and -W.  Some time ago I was asked about the
fixed seed, so add a comment.

author: philip
msg: Change the precedence of sources used for determining the external
editor. The order, in decreasing priority, is now:
SVN_EDITOR, config, VISUAL, EDITOR, hard coded SVN_CLIENT_EDITOR.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/util.c (svn_cl__edit_externally): Cause
SVN_EDITOR to have priority over the config files.

author: kraai
msg: * subversion/libsvn_subr/config_file.c
(svn_config_ensure): Change default section to global section in
outputted comment.

author: kfogel
msg: * tools/cvs2svn/design-notes.txt: Give three bits on how cvs2svn.py
works, based on reading the code and an illuminating phone call
with Greg Stein.
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py
(Commit.add): Comment.
(Commit.commit): Print a warning if the commit spans more than
COMMIT_THRESHOLD seconds.
(pass4): Comment, comment, comment.
(BuildRevision): Add querulous note about this unused class.
